tudoigual.rsa package¶

Submodules¶

tudoigual.rsa.rsa module¶

class tudoigual.rsa.rsa.RSA_PKC(gen=False, key_in=None, path=’.keys’, pub_in=None, form=’PEM’)[source]¶

Bases: object

decrypt(ciphertext)[source]¶
Parameters:string message (byte) – Ciphertext to be decrypted, an octet string of length k (k denotes the length in octets of the RSA modulus n).
Returns:Message, an octet string of length mLen, where mLen <= k - 2hLen - 2.
encrypt(message, key=None)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • string message (byte) – The message to encrypt, also known as plaintext. It can be of variable length, but not longer than the RSA modulus (in bytes) minus 2, minus twice the hash output size.
  • string key (byte) – RSA key.
Returns:

A string, the ciphertext in which the message is encrypted. It is as long as the RSA modulus (in bytes).
gen_rsa_key(key_length=2048, path=’.keys’, form=’PEM’)[source]¶

Generate RSA key object with an exponent 65537 in PEM format :param int key_length:

Key length, or size (in bits) of the RSA modulus. It must be a multiple of 256, and no smaller than 1024. Default is 2048 bits.
Parameters:
  • out (string) – Output directory. Default .keys.
  • form (string) – Specifies the output format. Default is PEM.
Returns:

Private key and public key (sk,pk)
sign(message, hash=<module ‘Crypto.Hash.SHA256’ from ‘/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Crypto/Hash/SHA256.py’>)[source]¶

Produce the PKCS#1 v1.5 signature of a message. :param byte string message:

The message to be signed.
Parameters:hash (string) – Cryptographic hash function used to compress the message.
Returns:The signature encoded as an octet string of length k, where k is the length in octets of the RSA modulus n.
verify(message, signature, hash=<module ‘Crypto.Hash.SHA256’ from ‘/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Crypto/Hash/SHA256.py’>)[source]¶

Verify that a certain PKCS#1 v1.5 signature is authentic. This function checks if the party holding the private half of the key really signed the message. :param byte string message:

Message whose signature is to be verified.
Parameters:
  • signature (string) – The signature that needs to be validated.
  • hash (string) – Cryptographic hash function used to compress the message.
Returns:

True if the signature is authentic. Raises InvalidSignature if the sgnature is not authentic.
tudoigual.rsa.rsa.import_Key(key_file)[source]¶

Import an RSA key (public or private half), encoded in standard form. :param string:

Path to the RSA key to be imported.
Returns:An RSA key object.
tudoigual.rsa.rsa.public_key_from_certificate(cert=None)[source]¶

Get public key from certificate.
